body:
Comment 3: 
The documentation comments should match the compiler error messages.

package main

const Huge = 1 << 100
const Four int8 = Huge >> 98

const (
	C1200 = Four * 300 // 300 cannot be represented as an int8
	C400  = Four * 100 // 400 cannot be represented as an int8
)

func main() {}

3814.go:7: constant 300 overflows int8
3814.go:7: constant 1200 overflows int8
3814.go:8: constant 400 overflows int8
